effect.name: Color Grading 2
effect.description:
Uses up to two 3d lookup tables (LUTs) to modify background image colors.
Last Updated: 2020-09-09 21:56
effect.author: Sketchy / MuddyMole / NaitorStudios

parameter.name: LUT Size
parameter.description: Dimensions of 3d LUT (eg. "64" for a 64x64x64 LUT).

parameter.name: LUT Image A
parameter.description: This will apply to the whole background, except where the mask applies.

parameter.name: LUT Image B
parameter.description: This will apply only to the area of the mask (non-transparent pixels on the same layer the effect is applied)

parameter.name: LUT Blend
parameter.description: Blend coefficient (1=100% LUT_A; 0=100% LUT_B or background).
